author: bitfalls
content: Hey is there a specific reason why asserts in the deposit contract don't have error messages? https://github.com/ethereum/eth2.0-specs/blob/dev/deposit_contract/contracts/validator_registration.v.py

author: hsiaowei
content:
<@387303511626350593> good point! I just looked at Vyper history, pseudo opcode `ASSERT_REASON` was added (with gas cost `85`, IMO it's minor) at 2018 Sep 25th release, and I think we just didn't know this feature was added.

I think we can add them after the audit. /cc <@550420431744794624> for the audit timeline
